headline: BGL Announces the Sale of Shamrock Environmental to Republic Services
summary: Brown Gibbons Lang & Company (BGL), a leading independent investment bank and financial advisory firm, is pleased to announce the sale of Shamrock Environmental (Shamrock), a premier, vertically integrated industrial waste and wastewater services platform and portfolio company of CenterOak Partners, to Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG). BGL's Environmental Infrastructure investment banking team served as a financial advisor to Shamrock in the transaction. The specific terms of the transaction
